title.rendered: Slagato technology’s CEO Alexander Radchenko accepted into Forbes Technology Council

content.rendered:
Alexander Radchenko, an CEO of Slagato technology's a digital transformation consultancy and engineering company that delivers cutting edge solutions for global organizations and technology startups, has been accepted into Forbes Technology Council, an invitation-only community for world-class CIOs, CTOs, and technology executives.

Alexander Radchenko was vetted and selected by a review committee based on the depth and diversity of his experience. Criteria for acceptance include a track record of successfully impacting business growth metrics, as well as personal and professional achievements and honors.

“We are honored to welcome Alexander into the community,” said Scott Gerber, founder of Forbes Councils, the collective that includes Forbes Technology Council. “Our mission with Forbes Councils is to bring together proven leaders from every industry, creating a curated, social capital-driven network that helps every member grow professionally and make an even greater impact on the business world.”

As an accepted member of the Council, Alexander has access to a variety of exclusive opportunities designed to help him reach peak professional influence. He will connect and collaborate with other respected local leaders in a private forum. Alexander will also be invited to work with a professional editorial team to share his expert insights in original business articles on Forbes.com, and to contribute to published Q&A panels alongside other experts.

“I feel extremely thrilled and honored to become a member of such an authoritative organization. Joining Forbes Technology Council community means more opportunities for me as an Slagato technology’s leader and, respectively, more space and ideas for the company’s ultimate growth”, mentioned Alexander Radchenko after getting accepted by Forbes Technology Council.

About Forbes Councils

Forbes Councils is a collective of invitation-only communities created in partnership with Forbes and the expert community builders who founded Young Entrepreneur Council (YEC). In Forbes Councils, exceptional business owners and leaders come together with the people and resources that can help them thrive.

For more information about Forbes Technology Council, visit forbestechcouncil.com. To learn more about Forbes Councils, visit forbescouncils.com.
